item.title: Niamh Charles: We have an opportunity to put things right
item.description: Chelsea FC Women’s Niamh Charles is excited to get back into Barclays FA Women’s Super League action as the Blues prepare to face West Ham United this evening.

item.title: Chelsea Founders’ Day: 117 years on, we really have won it all!
item.description: Happy Birthday, Chelsea Football Club!

item.title: Pre-Match Briefing: Norwich vs Chelsea
item.description: A moved fixture keeps the away games coming for the Blues. Club historian Rick Glanvill and club statistician Paul Dutton trail this Thursday outing…

item.title: Petr Cech column: Fast Ferreira and taking momentum to Norwich
item.description: This week, Petr Cech pays tribute to a departing long-time Chelsea colleague and looks at the upper reaches of the Premier League table…

item.title: Hayes provides fitness updates ahead of West Ham clash
item.description: Chelsea FC Women boss Emma Hayes spoke to the media at Cobham this afternoon as her team prepare to face West Ham United in the Barclays FA Women’s Super League tomorrow evening.

item.title: Middlesbrough travel update
item.description: We can confirm it is not possible to run a charter train service from London to Middlesborough for our FA Cup quarter-final.

item.title: Tuchel on how Havertz has recovered form and why Lukaku is staying positive
item.description: After watching Kai Havertz net four goals in his last five appearances for the Blues, boss Thomas Tuchel has paid tribute to his compatriot’s ability to recover form after a difficult period.

item.title: Women’s FA Cup ticket latest
item.description: Tickets are now on sale for Chelsea Women’s Vitality Women’s FA Cup quarter-final at home to Birmingham City Women.

item.title: Tuchel confirms James injury and updates on Christensen’s future
item.description: Thomas Tuchel has stated that Reece James is a major doubt for Thursday evening’s Premier League clash with Norwich.

item.title: Chelsea FC celebrates International Women’s Day
item.description: The club is running a host of initiatives to celebrate this year’s International Women’s Day, including celebrating pioneers of the past and present.

item.title: Media Watch: Mahrez linked to Chelsea, Blues 'enter race' for Leipzig's Nkunku and Premier League goalkeeper rules Mendy the best
item.description: In our look at the latest Chelsea-related news stories from the media, there are two transfer stories and an interview with a Premier League goalkeeper...

item.title: Blues Bulletin: Norwich City vs Chelsea
item.description: The second of our back-to-back Premier League away trips takes us to Carrow Road on Thursday evening and we bring you all the important statistics ahead of kick-off against Norwich City...

item.title: Gallery: Preparations for Norwich as Chilwell returns to the pitch
item.description: The Chelsea squad were back at Cobham continuing to get ready for Thursday evening's away trip to face Norwich City in the Premier League, while Ben Chilwell was out on the pitch for the first time since his knee injury.

item.title: Middlesbrough FA Cup ticket news
item.description: Details have been announced for ticket sales for our Emirates FA Cup quarter-final tie away to Middlesbrough.

item.title: Access Chelsea expertise with Perfect Play
item.description: Chelsea fans are today being offered exclusive coaching expertise and access to some of the world’s brightest football stars with the launch of Perfect Play.

item.title: Pat Nevin: Custodians of a club and good Chelsea wins
item.description: In this momentous period, Chelsea legend Pat Nevin writes about the club ownership and the two wins clocked up on the road in the past week…

item.title: International Women's Day: Jorginho and his mother recall how she inspired his love of football and compare trophies
item.description: As part of the celebrations for International Women's Day, Jorginho gives an intimate look behind the scenes with an emotional chat with his mother, revealing the huge impact she has had on his life and his career.

item.title: Media Watch: Newcastle want former Blue, pundit backs Chelsea for success and Reece James labelled as ‘unbelievable’
item.description: In our look at the latest Chelsea-related news stories from the media, there is a transfer link involving a former Blue, words from a pundit and an interview with an ex-Premier League boss...

item.title: West Ham United Women vs Chelsea Women preview: Kick-off time, how to watch live and more!
item.description: Chelsea FC Women are back in Barclays FA Women’s Super League action on Thursday evening and everything you need to know ahead of our clash with the Irons can be found here in our match preview…

item.title: Opening the floodgates - Other times Chelsea have scored four after a first-half stalemate
item.description: Chelsea had to wait until the second half to open the scoring against Burnley before racing away for a 4-0 victory, but that situation is not as rare as you might think. Here are more Blues matches where the floodgates have opened after the break following a first-half stalemate.
